data.text:
The Prometheus Deception

by Ludlum, Robert

Used

Very Good

Paperback

first

Show Details

Description:

London: Orion Books. Very Good. 2001. Reprint; First Printing. Paperback. Mass Market PB . Light reading creases, some loss to cover gilding, some foxing to edges of reading block. ; Nice tight copy, no names inside. Cover design by Nick Castle. Heavy book and priced accordingly. ; 640 pages; For years Nick Bryson was the top field agent for an ultra-secret US intelligence group, The Directorate. After a disastrous mission, Bryson was retired with a new identity. But now the CIA tell him that The Directorate was not what it seemed, and that, with the Cold War over, it is preparing a world threatening coup. The CIA recruits Bryson to stop them and angry at being used he agrees.... .
